idea-plugin.name: Kotlin Anko Converter For Xml
idea-plugin.description:
Convert layout xml to kotlin code use anko.
Java 8 at least.
Select or open a layout xml under res/layout.
Open the Code Menu.
Chose the last option "Convert Layout Xml to Kotlin Anko".
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Fix boolean attribute bug
Support weight
Support elevation,translationZ,rotation,rotationX,rotationY,scaleX,scaleY,translationX,translationY
Support 0dp transform to 0 or 0f
Support v4,v7 views exclude attributes Support textStyle and inputType

action.text: Convert Layout Xml to Kotlin Anko
